thread.title: Justin Bieber Gets New Tattoo of Giant Eagle on His Chest
thread.title_full: Justin Bieber Gets New Tattoo of Giant Eagle on His Chest

author: Just Jared
title: Justin Bieber Gets New Tattoo of Giant Eagle on His Chest
text:
Justin Bieber is sporting some fresh new ink!
The 23-year-old “Love Yourself” singer took to his Instagram stories on Monday (March 20) to show off his brand-new tattoo of a giant eagle on his chest.
PHOTOS: Check out the latest pics of Justin Bieber 
The tat is situated above Justin ‘s tattoo of the word “Purpose” – his 2015 album name – and below his “Son of God” tattoo, which he got at the end of last year.
Some of Justin ‘s other torso tattoos include his mom’s birth year – 1975 – in roman numerals, a crown, cross, seagull, and the word “forgive.” (See pics of him shirtless here .)
Head to our gallery to see Justin ‘s new eagle tattoo!
